entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
